sentences.sContent: Thus, we need to start getting rid of this material along with fissile material created for weapons use.
sentences.sContent_eng: Thus, we need to start getting rid of this material along with fissile material created for weapons use.
sentences.sCn: 因此，我们在清除用于制造武器的裂变材料的同时也需要开始清除这类材料。

sentences.sContent: And we will call upon countries to begin negotiations in January on a treaty to end the production of fissile material for weapons.
sentences.sContent_eng: And we will call upon countries to begin negotiations in January on a treaty to end the production of fissile material for weapons.
sentences.sCn: 我们将呼吁各国从明年一月开始谈判一项协议，以终止可用于武器的裂变材料的生产。

synos.tran: [生物]分裂性的；[地质]易分裂的

remMethod.val: fiss(裂开) + ile(易…的) → 易分裂的

words.tran: 可分裂的；可作核裂变的
分裂生殖的；有分裂倾向的
裂缝；裂沟（尤指岩石上的）
裂变；分裂；分体；分裂生殖法

trans.tranOther: able to be split by atomic fission
